divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS DRIVING ON 322 EAST 2 MILES NORTH OF THE FARM SHOW COMPLEX WHEN I NOTICED A LARg GREEN FIREBALL TRAVELING FROM A SOUTH EAST TO NORTH WEST DIRECTION .AS THE FIREBALL TRAVELED THRU MY LINE OF SIGHT IT BROKE UP INTO TWO PIECES AND APPEARED TO BE FALLING AT A HIGH RATE OF SPEED
Summary: green fireballs 2 miles north of harrisburg pa
